entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 80. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill minus 16 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Clear. Local blowing snow this evening. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023
